33ed0ea3-1a18-403d-b809-6d17c87edb1b.name: Solar Power Subsystem
33ed0ea3-1a18-403d-b809-6d17c87edb1b.description: Captures solar energy and stores it for system operation with a focus on portability.

embodiment.principle: Lightweight Photovoltaic Panels with Compact Battery Storage
embodiment.description: Uses lightweight, flexible solar panels and compact lithium-ion batteries for portability.

physics_models.name: Energy_Budget
physics_models.coding_directives:
def energy_budget(solar_irradiance, time):
    return solar_irradiance * 0.18 * time
physics_models.python_code:
def energy_budget(solar_irradiance, time):
    return solar_irradiance * 0.18 * time
physics_models.coder_notes: Solar irradiance is constant at 300 W/m².
assumptions: Solar irradiance is constant at 300 W/m².

33ed0ea3-1a18-403d-b809-6d17c87edb1b.verification_plan: Test under varying solar conditions to ensure consistent energy output.

bef3a879-0624-40a1-9f5b-fe09b47b0fce.name: Filtration Subsystem
bef3a879-0624-40a1-9f5b-fe09b47b0fce.description: Removes contaminants from raw water to produce potable water with minimal weight.

embodiment.description: Utilizes a lightweight ceramic filter element for basic filtration.

physics_models.name: Flow_Rate
physics_models.coding_directives:
def flow_rate(filter_area, permeability, viscosity):
    return (filter_area * permeability) / viscosity
physics_models.python_code:
def flow_rate(filter_area, permeability, viscosity):
    return (filter_area * permeability) / viscosity

bef3a879-0624-40a1-9f5b-fe09b47b0fce.verification_plan: Test filtration efficiency under various water quality conditions.

7e150b13-9294-497f-817d-aec1a660b6e5.name: Water Quality Monitoring Subsystem
7e150b13-9294-497f-817d-aec1a660b6e5.description: Monitors and displays water quality parameters with a focus on portability.

embodiment.description: Incorporates compact sensors for pH, turbidity, and TDS.

physics_models.name: Sensor_Response
physics_models.coding_directives:
def sensor_response(sensor_delay, processing_time):
    return sensor_delay + processing_time
physics_models.python_code:
def sensor_response(sensor_delay, processing_time):
    return sensor_delay + processing_time
physics_models.coder_notes: Constant sensor delay and processing time.
assumptions: Constant sensor delay and processing time.

7e150b13-9294-497f-817d-aec1a660b6e5.verification_plan: Test sensor accuracy and response time under various conditions.

5fb983ca-cb6c-4a88-b1ac-003844730b55.name: Power Management Subsystem
5fb983ca-cb6c-4a88-b1ac-003844730b55.description: Manages and optimizes power distribution and storage with a focus on portability.

embodiment.principle: Lightweight Charge Controller with Battery Management
embodiment.description: Uses a lightweight charge controller and compact battery management system.

physics_models.name: Charge_Discharge
physics_models.equations: Battery Level = Initial Charge - (Discharge Rate * Time)
physics_models.coding_directives:
def battery_level(initial_charge, discharge_rate, time):
    return initial_charge - (discharge_rate * time)
physics_models.python_code:
def battery_level(initial_charge, discharge_rate, time):
    return initial_charge - (discharge_rate * time)

5fb983ca-cb6c-4a88-b1ac-003844730b55.verification_plan: Test battery life and charging efficiency under various loads.
